snippet: A former bookkeeper for the city of Dixon was sentenced Thursday to nearly 20 years in prison for embezzling more than $53 million from the community.
abstract: Rita Crundwell, former bookkeeper for Dixon, Ill, is sentenced to nearly 20 years in prison for embezzling more than $53 million from the community.
lead_paragraph: A former bookkeeper for the city of Dixon was sentenced Thursday to nearly 20 years in prison for embezzling more than $53 million from the community.

headline.main: Illinois: 20-Year Prison Sentence for Bookkeeper Who Embezzled
headline.print_headline: Illinois: 20-Year Prison Sentence For Bookkeeper Who Embezzled
